tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption_reports (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  fuel_consumed DECIMAL,
  mileage_at_refuel DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle ( 
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  make VARCHAR(50), 
  model VARCHAR(50), 
  year INT, 
  fuel_capacity DECIMAL 
 );

CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption ( 
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicle(vehicle_id), 
  date DATE, 
  liters_consumed DECIMAL, 
  miles_driven DECIMAL 
 );

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumption (
    fuel_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    liters DECIMAL,
    kilometers INT
);

CREATE TABLE FuelLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    fuel_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    total_fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  fuel_date DATE,
  fuel_amount DECIMAL,
  odometer_reading INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT
);
